Articles.Content: Soo, i`m doing a last minute cini for a certain space probe downloaded camera tools, I went out to the launch pad to test a few camera angles (its in rss), but theres no sign that its even in the install! Theres no tab or anything! Is this a known thing, or does it have some sort of dependency that I don`t know about, or something?
Happened to me too. Can't do cinematics.
